accuracy_metrics.note: Awaiting Todd's decision on Product 58498 to calculate accuracy

patterns.description: FBM listings with good ratings but 0% buy box share represent FBA conversion opportunities
patterns.expected_improvement: 60% buy box win rate after FBA conversion

patterns.description: Products with existing demand but limited availability in market
success_indicators: Specific replacement item not widely available

patterns.description: Products with 4.5+ rating but facing only Medium competition strength
success_indicators: Page 1 ranking on key keywords available
patterns.expected_outcome: Can gain market share with optimization

patterns.description: Seasonal products (70-80% sales in 4 months) with 50%+ margins can justify risk
risk_factors: Must hit seasonal window (April launch for May-August peak)

patterns.description: Bulky items dramatically affected by freight allocation method
success_indicators: Cubic volume freight allocation penalizes product
Flat rate allocation ($5/unit) improves margins significantly
patterns.financial_impact: Can swing product from non-viable to viable
patterns.recommendation: Always calculate both methods for bulky items
patterns.scoring_adjustment: Recalculate margins with flat rate before rejection

patterns.description: Small batch (24 units) costs 50% more per unit than full container (700 units)
patterns.critical_learning: NEVER evaluate product viability on small-batch costs
patterns.recommendation: Always calculate margins at full container volume
patterns.scoring_adjustment: If margins fail at small batch, recalculate at full container before rejection

rejection_patterns.description: Cannot proceed without brand authorization from trademark holder
auto_reject_criteria: Chicken-egg situation (need PO to get approval, need approval to get PO)

rejection_patterns.description: 4-tier margin evaluation system: 16%+ STRONG GO, 15%+ GO, 10-15% SPECIAL REVIEW, <10% NO GO

review_criteria: Path to 15%+ margin visible (price increase, cost reduction)
Volume economics improve margin at full container

tier_4_reject.description: Auto-reject - no viable path to profitability

rejection_patterns.exception: New launches may go negative temporarily if market strongly validated

special_review_10_to_15: 58951 (Pool Cover - 4.5% margin at market price, but tests at premium pricing)

scoring_weight_adjustments.note: These weights adjust over time based on accuracy of predictions

learning_queue.validation_notes: Awaiting Todd's decision and market results
